meanings.definition: A unit of electric current equal to one thousandth of an ampere.
meanings.sent1: My phone charger uses one milliampere to charge slowly.
meanings.sent2: The electronic device requires a milliampere of current to function properly.
meanings.sent3: I tried to power a giant robot with just a milliampere, but it barely moved!
meanings.sent4: Her energy was like a milliampere, barely noticeable but always present.
meanings.sent5: The tiny milliampere of light illuminated the dark room, revealing hidden treasures.
